mapper.sql: s.id id, s.title title, s.content content, s.year year, s.publishTime publishTime, s.roleId roleId, s.dScore dScore, s.lScore lScore, s.hScore hScore, s.rate rate, s.otherAttr otherAttr, s.sumScore sumScore
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
INSERT INTO t_sheze (title,content,year,publishTime,roleId,dScore,lScore,hScore,rate,otherAttr,sumScore) VALUES (#{title},#{content},#{year},#{publishTime},#{roleId},#{dScore},#{lScore},#{hScore},#{rate},#{otherAttr},#{sumScore})
mapper.select: SELECT d_c.id,d_c.content,d_c.userId,d_c.arrangeId, d_a.shezeId, d3_a.shezeId sheze3Id, u_d.id userShezeId,u_d.commitTime FROM t_sheze_content d_c LEFT JOIN t_sheze_arrange d_a ON d_c.arrangeId = d_a.id LEFT JOIN t_sheze3_arrange d3_a ON d_c.arrangeId = d3_a.id LEFT JOIN t_user_sheze u_d ON d_c.userId = u_d.userId and IFNULL(d_a.time,d3_a.time) = u_d.time and IFNULL(d_a.shezeId,d3_a.shezeId) = u_d.shezeId WHERE d_c.year=#{year} and u_d.state = 1
